live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
34633.summary: Some customers in the Glendale Park Estates area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34633.title: Mar 7 – Red Deer (Glendale Park Estates) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
